name: Toxtricity (Low Key)
description: The Punk Pokémon. Capable of generating 15,000 volts of electricity, this Pokémon looks down on all that would challenge it.

abilities.name: Punk Rock
abilities.description: When this Pokémon uses a sound-based move, it adds its STAB bonus to the damage. This Pokémon has resistance to sound-based moves.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
